name: @tradle/qr-schema
description: Data parser and creator for deep links of mycloud.
author: Mark Vayngrib <mark@tradle.io>

scripts.prepare: protocol-buffers schema.proto -o schema.js && echo "/* eslint-disable no-var */\n$(cat schema.js)\n" > schema.js && protocol-buffers-dts schema.proto -o schema.d.ts && standard --fix
scripts.test: npm run prepare && npm run test:unit && npm run lint
